fullplot: A two-hour Battlestar Galactica special that tells the story of the Battlestar Pegasus several months prior to it finding the Galactica.
plot: A two-hour Battlestar Galactica special that tells the story of the Battlestar Pegasus several months prior to it finding the Galactica.
title: Battlestar Galactica: Razor
writers: Glen A. Larson (based on the series created by: "Battlestar Galactica")
